items.secDescrText: Summons an icy shield that protects against physical and fire damage. It drains your mana while active and at a faster rate while you are moving. When you have no mana left, the skill turns off. While active, it leaves a trail of ground ice which lasts for a short duration.
explicitMods: Additional 28 Mana drained per second while moving
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal lightning damage to attackers when you block their attacks.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers you've cast.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, making them more vulnerable to stuns. Hitting the cursed targets will leech life and mana, and killing them will result in a chance to gain an endurance charge.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies grant 5% Life Leech when Hit
Cursed enemies grant 4% Mana Leech when Hit
Cursed enemies have a 21% chance to grant an Endurance Charge when slain
Cursed enemies have an additional 10% chance to be Stunned
Cursed enemies have 20% reduced Stun Recovery
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. If cumulative physical damage prevented by your blocking or armour reaches a threshold, the shields explode outwards, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.
explicitMods: Shields break after 47 total Damage is prevented
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it runs out of time and dissipates completely.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Hits the enemy, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. If the enemy is frozen and is on less than one third life, they will shatter when hit by Glacial Hammer. Requires a Mace or Staff.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Summons a short-lived flaming skull that rushes at nearby enemies and attacks them rapidly. Enemies will not directly engage these spirits, and can pass through them.
explicitMods: Can summon up to 50 Raging Spirits at a time
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Fires an arc of knives in front of the caster which deals physical damage.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Places a mine that will teleport you to it when detonated. It covers both your escape and arrival with a cloud of smoke that blinds enemies, and gives you a temporary buff to movement speed.
explicitMods: Places a Remote Mine which uses this Skill when detonated
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Triggered Spells have 20% increased Spell Damage
Supported Melee Attacks will Cast Supported Spells on Kill
You cannot Cast Supported Spells directly
items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc towards the target. Also does damage to other nearby monsters. Only works with Axes and Swords.
explicitMods: When Dual Wielding, Deals 65% Damage from each Weapon combined
